plot: Jeong-woo tries to be a good wife and mother but, after witnessing her husband's adultery, her anger drives her into the arms of another man.
title: Angae buin
plot_es: Jeong-woo tries to be a good wife and mother but, after witnessing her husband's adultery, her anger drives her into the arms of another man.
plot_en: Jeong-woo tries to be a good wife and mother but, after witnessing her husband's adultery, her anger drives her into the arms of another man.
